about_the_game:
Proof of concept pre-alpha demo. Creative criticism is encouraged.

👽The next pre-alpha demo update is coming soon!👽

Current build: Pre-Alpha ver. 3.03567

Wishlist and Follow this game to keep informed.

And join our mailing list for exclusive updates and offers at

We want your feedback!
Contact@blackstreakanime.com

If you are new to the game please play the tutorial within the demo.

⭐Each boss has a hard (AU) mode that can be unlocked. Here is how to unlock them:

Rita Ricotta- Defeat her before the TV comes on.
Moon Man- Don't call Brody (shield) assist

Beating the AU mode bosses will not unlock any secrets.

Press Start+Select to restart the entire demo.

Press L1+R1 to skip the first level.

This build was made in Pixel Game Maker MV
All music and some sfx are temporary and will change in the full game.

name: Alien Up Demo
short_description: Pre-alpha demo. Just a proof of concept and only represents the base gameplay. Feedback is encouraged.
